Wheat.name: Germination
Wheat.description: The process of seed sprouting and the growth of roots and shoots.

Wheat.name: Vegetative Stage
Wheat.description: The phase where the plant establishes its leaves and stem growth.

Wheat.name: Reproductive Stage
Wheat.description: The period when the plant produces flowers and develops grains.

Wheat.name: Ripening
Wheat.description: The maturation process where the grains dry and become ready for harvest.

Rice.name: Land Preparation
Rice.description: The preparation of the field for rice cultivation, including plowing and leveling.

Rice.name: Seeding
Rice.description: The sowing of rice seeds in the prepared field.

Rice.name: Vegetative Stage
Rice.description: The phase where the rice plant grows leaves, stems, and roots.

Rice.name: Reproductive Stage
Rice.description: The period when the plant forms flowers and produces grains.

Rice.name: Harvesting
Rice.description: The process of cutting and gathering the mature rice panicles.

Maize.name: Preparation and Planting
Maize.description: The stage of land preparation and sowing maize seeds.

Maize.name: Growth and Development
Maize.description: The phase where the maize plant grows, forming leaves, stalks, and tassels.

Maize.name: Pollination
Maize.description: The process of transferring pollen from the tassels to the silks for fertilization.

Maize.name: Grain Formation
Maize.description: The period when the maize plant develops kernels on the cobs.

Maize.name: Harvesting
Maize.description: The process of collecting mature maize cobs for consumption or further processing.

Cotton.name: Sowing
Cotton.description: The process of planting cotton seeds in the field.

Cotton.name: Vegetative Growth
Cotton.description: The phase where the cotton plant establishes leaves, stems, and branches.

Cotton.name: Flowering
Cotton.description: The stage when the cotton plant produces flowers, which eventually turn into bolls.

Cotton.name: Boll Development
Cotton.description: The period of growth and maturation of cotton bolls, containing cotton fibers.

Cotton.name: Harvesting
Cotton.description: The process of picking mature cotton bolls from the plants.

Soybean.name: Planting
Soybean.description: The process of sowing soybean seeds in the field.

Soybean.name: Vegetative Growth
Soybean.description: The phase where the soybean plant develops leaves, stems, and branches.

Soybean.name: Flowering
Soybean.description: The stage when the soybean plant produces flowers.

Soybean.name: Pod Development
Soybean.description: The period when the soybean plant forms and develops pods.

Soybean.name: Harvesting
Soybean.description: The process of harvesting mature soybean pods.
